item.title: First Post

item.title: Python
item.description: Python and R code Pandas The panda package is extremely useful in python especially with datasets that contain multidimesional arrays with attached rows and columns. It has many numerical operational task which is heplful, to introductory usage of python. import pandas as pd quakes=pd.read_csv("https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/quakes.csv",index_col=0) type(quakes) ## <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'> len(quakes) ## 1000 len(quakes.columns) ## 5 The code above shows that even with python we are able to find data like how many observations for each variable, how many total observations total, and even the type of data frame quakes is.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
